title: Fortune.st
author: Fortune.st
created_time: January 04, 2023, 04:12:14 PMLast edit: March 03, 2023, 08:33:36 AM by Fortune.st
content: Dear Fortune.st Gamers,We hope you are having a wonderful holiday season with your loved ones! ðŸ¥³ ðŸ¤—On behalf of the entire Fortune.stâ„¢ team, we wish you the best for 2023ðŸŽŠ â€“ an exciting, fulfilling, loving, thrilling, and joyful year ahead. We want you to achieve your goals and dream.Fortune.st is doing everything we can to serve you better. If you haven't signed up yet, now is the right time to sign up and fund your account to begin to get used to us. Signing up with us now will put you in the great position to become one of our most valued VIP with automatic upgrade once the new system is launched. Here are top 20 improvements you are going to be getting with the upgrades in the work.REGISTER NOW AT FORTUNE.ST AND FUND YOUR ACCOUNT TO PARTICIPATE IN OUR PRIZE GIVEAWAYS AND BONUSES1. Â  Â  Anonymity: players can enjoy their gaming experience without having to reveal any of their personal information. The current phone number field will be completely eliminated.2. Â  Â  No lengthy account registration: players can start playing immediately without having to go through a lengthy registration process.3. Â  Â  No deposit required for the VIPs: players can start playing with real money without having to make a deposit.4. Â  Â  Fast and easy deposits and withdrawals: players can make transactions quickly and easily.5. Â  Â  Wide variety of games: players can choose from a wide range of games including slots, table games, and live casino games.6. Â  Â  Â High-quality graphics and sound: players can enjoy a high-quality gaming experience with realistic graphics and sound.7. Â  Â  Â Safe and secure: players can be sure that their personal and financial information is protected.8. Â  Â  Â Fair gaming: players can be sure that the games are fair and random.9. Â  Â  Â Mobile-friendly: players can play on the go using their mobile devices.10. Â  Â Live chat support: players can get help and support from customer service representatives through live chat.11. Â  Â No download required: players can play the games directly in their web browsers.12. Â  Â Large payouts: players have the chance to win large payouts.13. Â  Â Progressive jackpots: players can win big with progressive jackpots.14. Â  Â VIP program: players can earn rewards and benefits through a VIP program.15. Â  Â Multiple currencies and languages: players can play in their preferred currency and language.16. Â  Â No geographical restrictions: players can play from anywhere in the world.17. Â  Â 100% Cryptocurrency: players make transactions using cryptocurrencies only.18. Â  Â Provably fair games: players can verify the fairness of the games using cryptographic methods.19. Â  Â Instant play: players can start playing the games instantly without having to download any software.20. Â  Â High-quality customer service: players can get help and support from a dedicated customer service team.Please, go over to https://fortune.st/ now and register an account, I promise you'll be glad you did. Feel free to suggest any addition you'd like to see.We want to express our deepest gratitude for your trust and cooperation in choosing us as your No KYC Casino platform. We look forward to continuing our partnership and helping you reach your dreams in 2023. We are committed to offering the best and most reliable services in 2023ðŸŽŠ to help you reach your full gaming potential. We are currently working hard to improve our services and provide stable and comfortable solutions for each of our customers.For 2023, We are working to expand our services. This will include Provably Fair games, more payment options, and more products. We want to ensure that we can provide the best possible service for your needs. Please let us know if you have any questions or suggestions about these upcoming changes.As you awaits the updates, I'm Inviting you to Sign up at Fortune.st and test our existing games. I'm giving out $1,000 free credit to 10 people to test the games. Signup and contact us using the contact form to request for your free credits.So here's to 2023! ðŸŽ‰With best regardsUpdate: Based on the responses in this thread regarding the phone number field in the signup forum, I would like to clarify that every information you are entering in the registration form are just for formality sake as we won't request for verification. The most important information is your password. Once you create your secure passwords, you are good to go. EVERY OTHER DETAILS ARE FOR MERE FORMALITY AND CAN BE FILLED WITH ANYTHING. However, be rest assured the coming upgrade will not include such fields.Please. request for your free credit vis contact form to enable us identify your account to be credited. If you have requested through email as originally stated, please go back to the site and request via contact form.The credit is for test purpose and is not to be withdrawn. You are required to use it within 2 days and if you fund your account within the time frame, the credit will upgrade as part of the 120% bonus to you.Our upgrade will center on adding provably fair games and other exciting products and features that will make the platform truly worldclass. More details will be shared and we proceed. Thank you for your kind words and suggestions so far. We look forward to becoming one of your preferred gaming destinations.

comments.author: Ojima-ojo
comments.body: Happy new year to the entire fortune .st team and looking forward to an amazing 2023, I hope we see a new customer oriented promotion that will expose you to the bitcointalk community this year.As a non kyc casino, you will receive much attention here as most players from this forum are well aware of the risk of kyc on online platforms because of identity theft and so many other things.

comments.author: sujonali1819
comments.body: Hi, Happy New Year. I have visited the site and tried to register. But somethings forced me to stop registration which is Phone number. It could be cause losing a lot of users who priority their online privacy. I will suggest you to keep only Email and Password for registration. Btw if you really want to get some constructive feedback to build the project perfect, I would like to suggest to start a review campaigns. Where many quality guys will review your site and share the feedbacks as a review here. If you want you can pm me for more details. I can help you to run the review campaigns + promotional campaigns in the future if need. Thank you.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Happy new year to you and the entire fortune team. Congratulations on your new project and welcome onboard this platform. I see you have a good website interface. If I may ask why requesting for customers mobile number upon registration when you already have email address option. I am of the opinion that you either remove the phone number spot or you make it optional while registering because I do not see any reason why one would need to fill his phone number there or you have restrictions on countries from getting registered? Another thing I would say is that you will have to register a copper member account as your account is a new bie so you could be able to make pictorial upload here for prospective participants to see and know what you offer because that attracts them to reading your post and picking interest in your casino.Â  Lastly, as a new casino project in other to getÂ  the attention of participants onboard this platform I would advise you seek the service of a good signature campaign manager with good reputation here who will do a perfect advertisement job for your project. I believe with these opinion you can scale through with them

comments.author: Fortune.st
comments.body: Quote from: sujonali1819 on January 04, 2023, 04:40:55 PMHi, Happy New Year. I have visited the site and tried to register. But somethings forced me to stop registration which is Phone number. It could be cause losing a lot of users who priority their online privacy. I will suggest you to keep only Email and Password for registration. Btw if you really want to get some constructive feedback to build the project perfect, I would like to suggest to start a review campaigns. Where many quality guys will review your site and share the feedbacks as a review here. If you want you can pm me for more details. I can help you to run the review campaigns + promotional campaigns in the future if need. Thank you. Yes, that's a good observation and we promise to get rid of it in the upcoming updates. But one thing good is that we don't care whatever you put in there as your phone number. Feel free to complete your registration and put any number as your phone number.About your suggestion concerning review campaign, We will thing about that and get back to you as soon as we reached decision. Meanwhile, you can email me all the details you want me to know via the email address in the original post.

comments.author: Merit.s
comments.body: With the phone number request it is not private anymore and you said no KYC but I still see there is KYC and members of this forum will no buy this idea. Serving people better this year should be your priority so that bitcointalk members will enjoy your platform and patronize the platform. As said make a review of your casino so that top members here can make suggestions on a better way to serve your customers.Happy New year

Serving people better this year should be your priority so that bitcointalk members will enjoy your platform and patronize the platform. As said make a review of your casino so that top members here can make suggestions on a better way to serve your customers.Happy New yearOps already clarify that in his last reply concerning phone numbers on registration page, he said you can use any random number you wish as your phone number and it doesn't matter if the number is wrong or right it is just a process also ops promised ro get the phone number option off from the site in the next update.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Happy new year fortune.st, 2022 no doubt has been an awesome year with several good achievements for many, but i have absolutely no doubt as well that 2023 would be a greater year, not just for businesses but also for the crypto market, which tends to affect crypto businesses when ever its red, 2022 has come and gone and have not failed in showing us some ugly marks, but i believe 2023 is here to erase those ugly marks and bring some major improvements to the market as well as businesses, so we all should braze ourselves, get ready to seize every good opportunities this year is about to offer.Quote from: Fortune.st on January 04, 2023, 06:41:18 PMQuote from: sujonali1819 on January 04, 2023, 04:40:55 PM~Snip~Yes, that's a good observation and we promise to get rid of it in the upcoming updates. But one thing good is that we don't care whatever you put in there as your phone number. Feel free to complete your registration and put any number as your phone number.I noticed the phone number thing as well and was going to talk about it, but glad that Sujonali1819 already did that, also glad to know that any number filled in there would do, but with the red star which indicates that filling that box is necessary, i dont think anyone would know that any number filled there would do without being told, so many you guys can just remove the star and make filling that part optional.

comments.author: notblox1
comments.body: Quote from: Fortune.st on January 04, 2023, 04:12:14 PMWe want to express our deepest gratitude for your trust and cooperation in choosing us as your No KYC Casino platform. Why are you asking customers to register accounts with adding their phone numbers if you say that you are No KYC Casino platform?This is not really anonymous unless people use some kind of burner numbers, but I don' think this is needed at all.I registered in many casinos and only a few of them are asking for phone numbers, and I think you should remove this requirement.

comments.body: Quote from: notblox1 on January 04, 2023, 08:14:16 PMQuote from: Fortune.st on January 04, 2023, 04:12:14 PMWe want to express our deepest gratitude for your trust and cooperation in choosing us as your No KYC Casino platform. Why are you asking customers to register accounts with adding their phone numbers if you say that you are No KYC Casino platform?This is not really anonymous unless people use some kind of burner numbers, but I don' think this is needed at all.I registered in many casinos and only a few of them are asking for phone numbers, and I think you should remove this requirement.Claiming out to be anonymous but not actually it is because of these things specially asking out various personal informations like phone numbers is a no go.Yes, we've seen lots of sites as of todays but those top ranking or known ones arent asking out these kind of information which this is also a reason on why people do love to engage nor stick with these places due to being that anonymous.We've seen some newer sites asking this type of information which is really highly frowned upon into this forum.People would find it not to be that interesting if we do speak about these things.People would surely be avoiding and would be getting away becauseÂ  its never been that good to ask out such thing.

comments.body: Quote from: RILWAN on January 04, 2023, 06:57:01 PMOps already clarify that in his last reply concerning phone numbers on registration page, he said you can use any random number you wish as your phone number and it doesn't matter if the number is wrong or right it is just a process also ops promised ro get the phone number option off from the site in the next update.I tried to register because of no KYC is needed and 1000 free credits but on the registration page they ask for a mobile number, I am pretty sure a lot of people will not register just for this.If it doesn't matter if the number is wrong or right than they should remove it ASAP.

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: Quote from: Fortune.st on January 04, 2023, 04:12:14 PMAs you awaits the updates, I'm Inviting you to Sign up at Fortune.st and test our existing games. I'm giving out $1,000 free credit to 10 people to test the games. Signup and contact us via email (help@fortune.st) to request for your free credits.You need to mention more about this offer or promotion. I mean whatâ€™s the wagering requirement? And If we make more money from this bonus, then will we be able to withdraw it? Also the domain and casino name looks very premium, just make sure you market it smartly. Moreover No KYC feature is also like a cherry on the top. Do you guys allow users from all over the globe? Or do you have restrictions for people of some specific country? Moreover if you can also hint about your new upcoming games, then definitely more people will wait to try it. Wishing you all the best for your future.
